predicate.note: Frames file for 'stall' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with verbs of motion.

roleset.name: (cause to) cease/slow forward motion

example.name: passive
example.text: But, he added, interest-rate-sensitive stocks in general are stalled.

roleset.note: This is anomalous. Expect the ergative:

example.name: ergative
example.text: The U.S. trade deficit swelled to $10.77 billion in August, prompting worries that the nation's export drive had stalled.

example.name: occasionally transitive
example.text: John stalled his restored 1957 Mustang right in front of Mary.

example.name: ergative again
example.text: In the past two years, the stock almost stalled out.
